mean_cn: n. 面纱，遮蔽物；  v. 用面纱掩盖，掩饰
mean_en: a covering of very thin transparent material worn, especially by women, to protect or hide the face, or as part of a hat, etc.; a thin layer that stops you from seeing something
sentence: Lift the veil so I can see your beautiful face.
sentence_trans: 把面纱掀起来，让我看你美丽的脸。
